Reviews.Title: Top quality for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Duane
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect camera kit for an upgrade from a point and shoot camera. Canon is top quality and all of the equipment that came in this kit is extremely useful and much needed.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in the seller
Reviews.Author: Anderson
Reviews.Content: The Camera is great! Everything works like it is supposed to, and almost all of the accessories are provided. I ordered a 32GB card and was only provided an 8 GB card.. that is disappointing, but since memory isnt that expensive anymore, not that big of a deal i guess. Also, I was supposed to receive a tulip lens shade. Didnt get that either. Otherwise, I did get everything that was promised to me. The Camera itself and the second lens and Macro lenses all work great. I will get a ton of use out of this camera overseas on deployment, but I dont think I will order from the Sunset Electronics again.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Camera
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I just started using the camera a few days ago and this kit is almost everything I expected. I'm no professional and plan to use it to take alot of great amateur pictures. With all the extras included in this kit I feel I'll have great opportunities to try new ways to take photos.The only disappointment so far is the tiny camera bag that's included in this kit. There are so many extras that come in this kit that I bought a large camera bag and I'm using the included bag for the less used items so, nothing is wasted!Also, The tripod seems so light weight and flimsy but it has many advantages over it's larger, heavier and bulkier counterpart tripods. It's super transportable, don't take up any space to store and it is very quick to set up.Give me a few months to learn to use this camera and I'll post a new review.

Reviews.Title: T4I is a better choice if you can afford a couple of hundred dollars more.
Reviews.Author: Handgunner
Reviews.Content: This was my second digital camera.. My first was a Minolta point and shoot. This was my intro into SLR cameras. Don't get me wrong, it's a great starter camera and has some great features but i did have to give the "package" 3 stars because of the accesories. The bag is too small to carry all of the things that come with it. The flash that fits on the on top of the camera did not work. It was a cheapie so I threw it out since the postage to send it back was more than it was worth. Lastly, It came with a wireless remote and this camera is not wireless.One more thing, the 75/300 mm lens does not have a stabilizer, but it is a kit lens and works well.One cool point for new SLR buyers  ...  It has an automatic setting that does all the thinking for you!  It turns your SLR into a point and shoot and takes great pictures! If you have the extra bucks, go for the T4i. It will do movies, same as the T4i, but has a built in Auto Focus. The T3i does not.Hope I was some help,  Handgunner

Reviews.Title: resumen
Reviews.Author: jose francisco
Reviews.Content: me gusto el producto,es justo lo que pedi y lo que decia el anuncio, es muy buena calidad y me llego a tiempo, felicitaciones  y gracias

Reviews.Title: Good Kit
Reviews.Author: Geonney
Reviews.Content: This was my first camera and It did its job.Even though its a the lower end of dlsr cameras I was able to pull of some pretty decent shots with it.I think the kit as a whole i would give an 7.5 out of 10.Tripod is trashHD and wide angle trashbag is small but it does its jobnever used the flasheverything else was pretty solid though

Reviews.Title: Rip off
Reviews.Author: Gerry Cheramie
Reviews.Content: A few of the lenses they came with this camera didn't even fit on this camera. Only three of the items in this bundle were actually made by Canon the rest were produced by a third company which were substandard and would never meet the requirements which canon is known for I was thoroughly disappointed with these.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and kit
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Walters "Kimberly"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  I really like the lens and the additional items that come with the kit.  Certainly a good price for the bundle.  This is a great camera for someone that wants to become a better photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Can't believe I was able to get all of this for the cost! I've got a lot of my friends whom have the same camera, but paid what I paid for just the camera alone. Super excited about all the things that came with it. Great great great price!!Thanks so much for the business!

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot
DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor, 2.7" Clear View LCD
720p HD Movie Mode, 100-6400 ISO
63 Zone Dual-Layer System / 9 Point AF
3 fps Continuous Shooting
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 (1100d) SLR Digital Camera w/ Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Autofocus Lens & Canon Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III Autofocus Lens, 3 Extra Lens + Close Up Kit, 2 batteries and chargers 32gb Sdhc Memory Card, Soft Carrying Cases, Tripod & Much More !!
